name: Dash Jump: Racing Bounce Rider
description:
Get ready to test your skills while running through the cube platform stages.

Simple one touch game play that will keep you entertained for hours. Just tap to dodge dangerous cubes, spikes and other various obstacles.

Game Features
- Simple and easy to use one touch game controls.
- Clean and colorful graphics.
- Amazing dubstep rhythm based music.


Download the game now for FREE and enjoy. Surely you will not regret it.
